::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer relaxes a bit when he hears that the bot didn't have bad 
intentions. He wouldn't have liked to fight here underwater.

"I'm here to offer you to join the Alliance," he says to 
Bigfish, "You want in?"

DevilDuer keeps his hand over his gun, knowing what he had to do if 
the bot refused to go peacefully.
